attr.title: KOReader
attr.desc: KOReader is a super flexible reading app that lets you enjoy ebooks, PDFs, and more just the way you like. With features like custom fonts, easy zooming, and built-in dictionaries, it makes reading comfy and fun. Great for book lovers who wants to read on a HandheldðŸ“šðŸ’«
